summary: Implements the Home Assistant light platform for Philips Hue devices, defining an entity class that manages Hue light state, attributes (brightness, color temperature, hue‑saturation, effects) and asynchronous turn‑on/off operations, along with supporting setup and bridge update utilities.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant users to discover, monitor, and control Philips Hue lighting through a unified interface, supporting automation, scenes, and remote management of Hue lights.
